data.name: Why use the Aiursoft Template?
data.value: 為什麼使用 Aiursoft 模板？

data.name: Seamlessly integrate with any OpenID Connect provider, with automatic role synchronization.
data.value: 無縫整合任何 OpenID Connect 提供者，並自動同步角色權限。

data.name: A modern, feature-rich, and highly extensible foundation for your next web application.
data.value: 一個現代化、功能豐富且高度可擴展的基礎架構，為您的下一個網頁應用程式提供堅實根基。

data.name: Easily switch between providers like SQLite, MySQL, SQL Server, and an in-memory database for testing.
data.value: 可輕鬆切換不同的資料庫供應商，例如 SQLite、MySQL、SQL Server 以及用於測試的記憶體資料庫。

data.name: The navigation bar automatically adjusts based on user roles and permissions.
data.value: 導覽列會根據使用者角色和權限自動調整顯示內容。

data.name: Automatic, AI-driven translation into 28 languages for global reach.
data.value: 自動化、AI 驅動的翻譯，支援 28 種語言，助您觸及全球市場。

data.name: A built-in Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) system for fine-grained permission management.
data.value: 內建的角色型存取控制（RBAC）系統，用於細粒度的權限管理。

data.name: Includes extensive documentation and practical examples to get you started quickly.
data.value: 包含豐富的文件與實用範例，助您快速上手。

data.name: A complete solution for user authentication and profile management right out of the box.
data.value: 一套完整的用戶認證與個人檔案管理解決方案，開箱即用。

data.name: A fully responsive layout that looks great on both desktop and mobile devices.
data.value: 完全響應式佈局，在桌面和行動裝置上都能呈現絕佳外觀。

data.name: Features a built-in file management system with automatic avatar compression.
data.value: 具備內建檔案管理系統，並支援自動頭像壓縮功能。

data.name: All dependencies are automatically registered and always available via constructor injection.
data.value: 所有依賴項都會自動註冊，並始終可透過建構函式注入使用。

data.name: Comes with full Docker support for simplified, consistent, and reliable deployments.
data.value: 提供完整的 Docker 支援，實現簡化、一致且可靠的部署流程。

data.name: Smart dark mode that automatically adapts to the user's system settings.
data.value: 智慧深色模式，可自動適應使用者的系統設定。

data.name: This is a template project, where we start the voyager...
data.value: 這是一個模板專案，我們從這裡開啟航程...

data.name: Build your next big thing,
data.value: 打造你的下一個大事業，

data.name: Achieve more with Aiursoft Template
data.value: 使用 Aiursoft Template 成就更多

data.name: Here's what developers from our community have to say.
data.value: 以下是我們社群開發者的心得分享。

data.name: Use it as a foundation for your SaaS, a backend for your mobile app, a corporate website, or a personal blog. The possibilities are endless.
data.value: 無論是作為您 SaaS 的基礎架構、行動應用程式的後端、企業網站或個人部落格，都能完美適用。可能性永無止境。

data.name: Here are some of the answers you might be looking for.
data.value: 以下是您可能正在尋找的一些解答。

data.name: Is it free to use Aiursoft Template?
data.value: 使用 Aiursoft Template 是否免費？

data.name: What do I need to get started?
data.value: 我需要準備什麼才能開始？

data.name: Aiursoft Template is our definitive choice for enterprise projects! It's built for developers and is lightweight yet powerful. We can skip all the boilerplate for authentication and user management.
data.value: Aiursoft Template 是我們企業級專案的不二之選！它專為開發者打造，輕量卻功能強大。我們可以直接跳過所有身份驗證和使用者管理的樣板程式碼。

data.name: How do I deploy my application?
data.value: 我要如何部署我的應用程式？

data.name: Yes, Aiursoft Template is completely free and open-source under the MIT License. You can use it for personal and commercial projects without any cost.
data.value: 是的，Aiursoft Template 在 MIT 許可證下完全免費且開放原始碼。您可以在個人和商業專案中免費使用它，無需任何費用。

data.name: You'll need the .NET 10 SDK, npm and your favorite IDE, like Visual Studio or JetBrains Rider. You can find the full setup guide in our documentation.
data.value: 您需要安裝 .NET 10 SDK、npm 以及您喜愛的 IDE，例如 Visual Studio 或 JetBrains Rider。您可以在我們的文件中找到完整的設定指南。

data.name: You can get community support via GitHub Discussions. Please visit our
data.value: 您可以透過 GitHub Discussions 獲得社群支援。請造訪我們的

data.name: for any inquiries or to report issues.
data.value: 如有任何疑問或回報問題。

data.name: Join our community and start building today!
data.value: 加入我們的社群，立即開始建構！

data.name: The template is built for easy deployment. It includes full Docker support, so you can containerize your app and run it anywhere. You can also deploy it directly to IIS, Azure App Service, or any server that supports ASP.NET Core.
data.value: 此模板專為簡化部署流程而設計。它提供完整的 Docker 支援，讓您能將應用程式容器化並隨處執行。您也可以直接部署到 IIS、Azure App Service 或任何支援 ASP.NET Core 的伺服器。

data.name: Sends a simple message to server. Lower is better.
data.value: 傳送簡單訊息至伺服器。數值越低越好。

data.name: Downloads 4GB chunks. Higher is better.
data.value: 下載 4GB 的資料區塊。數值越高越好。

data.name: Gap between server events. Target: ~100ms.
data.value: 伺服器事件間隔。目標：約 100 毫秒。

data.name: Your browser will send server a simple message and get a simple response. This number means the time it costs from request to response. The smaller the number, the better your network is.
data.value: 您的瀏覽器會向伺服器發送一個簡單訊息並取得回應。此數字代表從請求到回應所花費的時間。數字越小，表示您的網路狀況越好。

data.name: This number means how much gap time between current server event and last server event. The number should be close to 100ms. More than 120ms or less than 90ms is not proper.
data.value: 此數值表示目前伺服器事件與上一個伺服器事件之間的時間間隔。數值應接近 100ms，若超過 120ms 或低於 90ms 則屬異常。

data.name: Your browser will download 4 4GB files from our server. From the time it starts and it gets the file, we will help you calculate your network downloading speed. The larger the number, the better your network is.
data.value: 您的瀏覽器將從我們的伺服器下載 4 個 4GB 的檔案。從開始下載到取得檔案的時間，我們將協助您計算網路下載速度。數值越大，代表您的網路狀況越好。

data.name: Aiursoft Tracer is a simple network quality testing app. Helps testing the connection speed between you and the server.
data.value: Aiursoft Tracer 是一款簡單的網路品質測試應用程式，可協助測試您與伺服器之間的連線速度。
